resources.string: Spider-Man is a fictional superhero characterized by his iconic red and blue costume adorned with web patterns
He also possesses a "spider-sense" that alerts him to danger.
A fictional superhero appearing in comic books published by Marvel Comics
He is a blue anthropomorphic hedgehog known for his incredible speed, which is his trademark ability
Batman operates as a vigilante detective, striking fear into the hearts of criminals
Luffy is particularly known for wearing a red straw hat on his head.
Lionel Messi is an Argentine professional footballer widely regarded as one of the greatest players of all time
